h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
img_above_text:
# The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
## Upper Pagoda (Level 4)

The cell beyond will require you to have beaten Captain Lotus-Vision to unlock, and holds a **Treasure Chest** with materials in addition to the Wisp on the ledge, guarded by another Red-Haired Yaksha.

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, cavernous area within the Upper Pagoda (Level 4) of the Pagoda Realm, as described in the document "The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm." A character, likely the player, is seen approaching a dimly lit cell that requires defeating Captain Lotus-Vision to unlock. The cell contains a treasure chest with materials and a Wisp on a ledge, guarded by a Red-Haired Yaksha. The setting is atmospheric, with torches providing minimal light, enhancing the mysterious and challenging ambiance of this level.
